meanings.sent1: The shrilling alarm woke up the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The shrilling whistle signaled the end of the game.
meanings.sent3: The shrilling bird outside my window made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The shrilling wind through the trees sounded like a ghostly wail.
meanings.sent5: The shrilling scream of the kettle made me jump.

meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched, piercing sound
meanings.sent1: The teapot began shrilling when the water boiled.
meanings.sent2: The cat shrilling at the top of its lungs demanded attention.
meanings.sent3: The old car engine shrilling like a banshee needed fixing.
meanings.sent4: The child shrilling in excitement at the playground caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The wind shrilling through the cracks in the window kept me awake at night.
